{{Doomwiki|screen melt}} The '''screen wipe''' is a transition between two different types of screen display (such as from [[menu]] to game or from game to [[intermission]]). It is also possible to use specific wipe types between different screens in an [[intermission definition]].
The {{CVAR|R|wipetype}} console variable allows to choose which type of screen wipe is used by default; it can be modified from the [[Display options]] menu.
*"None" switches directly to the new screen, as in ''[[Heretic]]'' and ''[[Hexen]]''. *"Melt" is the original effect used by ''[[Doom]]''. *"Burn" is an effect original to [[ZDoom]] which makes the old screen burn into the new one. *"Crossfade" fades out the old screen while fading the new one in at the same time, as used in ''[[Strife]]''.
